item.title: “Thank You For This Brave Recognition”: Sebastian Stan Reacts To Best Actor Oscar Nom For Trump Biopic That Hollywood Studios Were Afraid To Distribute
item.description: Sebastian Stan expresses his gratitude over his first Oscar nomination for his controversial portrayal of Donald Trump in The Apprentice.

item.title: Insidious 6 Receives Disappointing Release Update
item.description: Insidious 6's release date has been delayed as the horror franchise's next installment is now slated to debut later than originally planned.

item.title: David Lynch Mystery Movie Considered One Of The Greatest Films Of All Time Is Trending On Streaming Following His Death
item.description: Director David Lynch's twisty mystery movie from 2001 has become a streaming hit following the filmmaker's death at 78 earlier this month.
